thread.section_title: FTBbeauty.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FTBbeauty.ca | ftbbeauty.ca
thread.title: Catie

author: Catie
title: Catie
text: I would not hesitate to reccomend Ftbbeauty to everyone. They had a great selection on things to choose from, and the fast and cheap (or free, depending on how much you spend) shipping is a great plus. I did have a problem with some of the eyeshadow pallets I recieved being smashed when they got to me, but they were super quick to respond and offer me either a refund or to reship them. I picked the reship and they sent them out super quickly, and I recieved them super quickly and they were perfect. So overall very pleased with the site and the customer service!
